title: My Account was stolen
body: When I was log in this game I found that this account was suspend and then I found my response email was changed. What should I do now? I have already sent the request of changing another email box but it need to be done by the original one.

replies.body:
Hey there,

You'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) for account recovery to Player Support, they will request information about your account to attempt to verify ownership, anything you can provide even if not on the list of things they request that is not publically available will be helpful in recovering your account.

this happend to me, do you know what riot said. send a ticket or whatever. and then you have to give details from ity it was made, to first 3 refunds and first 3 champs bought with ip and rp and credit cards used and last skins bought last champs bought cities and countries the account has been played in. so i gave all this info including the last 3 rp cards bought from shops ( i gave them them codes) and they denied me my account because i didnt have the original email. good luck getting your account, i wish you the best of luck but riot a fucktards and dont give a shit bro. might aswell start a new account or stop playing.
